_header: For now upon this first day I will my choice renew
Note: Formerly listed by refrain as IMEV 1496.
_description: John Lydgate, A lover’s New Year gift, ‘Amerous balade by Lydegate’ — one five-line and twenty-three 3-line stanzas with introductory couplet: ‘In honnour of þis hegh fest of custome &c.’

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
ffor nowe vpon þis first day I wil my choys renuweAl þe
                    whyles þat I lyve to hir to be trewe…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines:
…Now vpon þe first day of þis JanuaryeAnd to inferme
                    fully vp my choyse ay frome yere to yere
BLAdd16165.Attributed Title:
Amerous balade by Lydegate þat haþe loste his thanke of wymmen
                    (f. 253v)
